```{r setup}
library(rXTalkViz)
library(dplyr)
library(data.table)
```

```{r out.width="100%", out.height="100%"}
xTalkPlot(enrich.df = EnrichmentResult_GO_MF %>% 
            dplyr::filter(p.adjust < 0.05) %>% 
            as.data.frame(),
          colorEdge = F,
          fc.dat = de_res %>%
            dplyr::select(c("Gene.names","logFC")) %>% 
            as.data.frame()
)
```
